trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Escondido
There were no other sightings in Escondido on or around April 20th 2002
Summary: 2 Occasions I saw ufo lights in night sky
divs: Sighting DetailsOn April 17th and again on April 20th at approximately 3:15 AM I witnessed a redstar-appearing light in the western sky. I was simply looking into the stars andnoticed a bright, red light that flashed even brighter twice in same positionand went out. Two night later directly overhed, facinf east, a bright, whitelight flased on twice ,then actually moved about two finger widths at armslength towards the north. THESE WERE NOT STARS!
